thread.title: Demi Lovato sizzles in a plunging, open-front sheer dress at the 2017 Grammys
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato sizzles in a plunging, open-front sheer dress at the 2017 Grammys

author: Lindsey Sirera
title: Demi Lovato sizzles in a plunging, open-front sheer dress at the 2017 Grammys
text:
Demi Lovato sizzles in a plunging, open-front sheer dress at the 2017 Grammys Viva la Demi Lovato!
Let’s just all come out and agree that Demi Lovato’s completely sheer Grammys red carpet look was a total home run. She nailed it in a sexy, sheer Julien Macdonald number. The high-octane ensemble was just as fierce as the singer herself, with a crochet-like texture that wove in some glitzy metallic elements.
And with that ultra-feisty, décolletage-baring neckline offset by the plunging backless portion of the dress, the singer was nothing short of sizzling.
While it was difficult to look away from the “Confident” singer’s skin-tight, rock’n’roll-perfect dress, a careful eye will note that Demi had equally killer hair and makeup tonight. Because with a gorgeous gown like that, there’s just no playing it safe!
Getty Images The Grammy nominee opted to let her long chocolate dark down, pushing her perfectly tousled beach waves to one side.
Getty Images As for the makeup, she kept her skin dewy, her eyebrows perfectly arched and eyes ultra-smokey for a fittingly sexy look.
To polish off the sultry ensemble, Demi opted for David Thurman jewels.
All in all, we have two words for you, Dem: well done!
